description: This table contains a list of relevant events documented as the history of a patient's problem.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the problem record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: PRB_EVENT_STATE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the state of each event (active or inactive)


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Active


Inactive

columns.name: PRB_EVENT_INDEX
columns.description: Stores the index of each event in the problem's history

columns.name: PRB_EVENT_HX_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the history type that each event was created from


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Oncology History

columns.name: PRB_EVENT_STDATE_DT
columns.description: Stores the start date of each event

columns.name: PRB_EVENT_ENDATE_DT
columns.description: Stores the end date of each event

columns.name: PRB_EVENT_CAT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the category/type of each event


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Initial Diagnosis

columns.name: PRB_EVENT_DESC
columns.description: Stores the description/details of each event

columns.name: PRB_EVENT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: Stores the problem event note ID

columns.name: PROBLEM_EVENT_LINKED_ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item contains the action configured in Problem List Automated Actions (I LSD 2765) that triggered the automatic creation of the oncology history event on the same line.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


External Event


Sign Cancer Stage


Save Treatment or Therapy Plan


Save Radiation Therapy Episode

columns.name: PROBLEM_EVENT_AUTO_UPDATE_YN
columns.description:
This item stores a yes or no to indicate whether or not an event will automatically update.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: This column contains the contact serial number of the oncology history problem (LPL) contact.

columns.name: PRB_EVENT_USR_DTL_AUTO_NOTE_ID
columns.description: This column contains the note ID for the note containing the auto-generated event's user-entered comments.

columns.name: PRB_EVENT_AUTO_NOTE_BEHAVIOR_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains whether the user-entered comments will replace or be appended to the auto-generated event details when the event is viewed in a SmartLink or print group. This setting only applies to events which are generated by the system and cannot be otherwise edited.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Append


Replace

columns.name: PRB_EVENT_EXTERNAL_UNIQUE_KEY
columns.description: This item contains a key to uniquely identify an oncology history event created by the external events API. If filing an automated event based on chronicles data, this item should not be used.

columns.name: PROB_EXTERNAL_EVENT_START_DATE
columns.description: This item contains the start date for an oncology history event filed from the external events API. It should contain the same value as LPL 8103-problem event start date unless a user has chosen to manually override the start date for the event. If filing an automated event based on chronicles data, this item should not be used.

columns.name: PROB_EXTERNAL_EVENT_END_DATE
columns.description: This item contains the end date for an oncology history event filed from the external events API. It should contain the same value as LPL 8104-problem event end date unless a user has chosen to manually override the end date for the event. If filing an automated event based on chronicles data, this item should not be used.
